properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 3:24AM AKST until February 16 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow along with cold wind chills. Plan
on difficult travel conditions. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches are expected. Visibility will be reduced to one half mile
or less at times.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...Until noon Sunday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause
areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as low as
50 below zero are expected along the Bering Strait coast through
Saturday afternoon.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
